content.rendered:
When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice seems ineffective, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands and sets out on a path of revenge. After killing the street thug directly responsible for her death, he finds himself up against the thug’s brother, Rory Fetter, and his gang, who are just as determined to avenge their fallen comrade. What follows is a tense game of back-and-forth in which one man’s thirst for revenge gets the better of the other. William realizes that the desire for revenge always ends in the same way.

Directed By Jared Cohn

Written By Jared Cohn

Stars: Bruce Willis. Theo Rossi. Thomas Jane
